messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
A Pokémon Gym isn’t only about seeing
how tough your Pokémon happen to be.It’s so much deeper than just that.
It’s a test of you as a person.
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
I get to work all day with my
Pokémon, and even battle sometimes.I get all the fun I need every day!
